Dilation.title: dilation
Dilation.tooltip: Return the dilated image applying the same kernel in each channel.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: input image tensor with shape (B, C, H, W) and intensity from [0, 1].

kernel.title: kernel
kernel.tooltip: Positions of non-infinite elements of a flat structuring element with shape (kx,ky)

structuring_element.title: structuring_element
structuring_element.tooltip: Structuring element used for the grayscale dilation.

origin.title: origin
origin.tooltip: Origin of the structuring element. Default: None and uses the center of the structuring element as origin (rounding towards zero).

border_type.title: border_type
border_type.tooltip: It determines how the image borders are handled, where border_value is the value when border_type is equal to constant.

border_value.title: border_value
border_value.tooltip: Value to fill past edges of input if border_type is constant

max_val.title: max_val
max_val.tooltip: The value of the infinite elements in the kernel

engine.title: engine
engine.tooltip: convolution is faster and less memory hungry, and unfold is more stable numerically

image.title: image
image.tooltip: image: Dilated image with shape, shape of (B, C, H, W).

Erosion.title: erosion
Erosion.tooltip: Return the eroded image applying the same kernel in each channel.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: input image tensor with shape (B, C, H, W) and intensity from [0, 1].

kernel.title: kernel
kernel.tooltip: Positions of non-infinite elements of a flat structuring element with shape (kx,ky)

image.title: image
image.tooltip: image: Eroded image with shape, shape of (B, C, H, W).

Opening.title: opening
Opening.tooltip: Return the opened image, (that means, dilation after an erosion) applying the same kernel in each channel.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: input image tensor with shape (B, C, H, W) and intensity from [0, 1].

kernel.title: kernel
kernel.tooltip: Positions of non-infinite elements of a flat structuring element with shape (kx,ky)

image.title: image
image.tooltip: image: Opened image with shape, shape of (B, C, H, W).
